# CCAA

```{r}

k <- CCAA %>%
  filter(day == max(day)-7) %>% 
  select(IA_14, RT_14,r0) %>% 
  mutate_all(.funs="round", 2) 

reactable(k,
          columns = list(
            IA_14 = colDef(name = "Tasa de incidencia acumulada (14 d√≠as)",
              style = function(value) {
                color <- if (value > 250) {
                  "red"
                } else if (value > 150) {
                  "salmon"
                } else if (value > 50) {
                  "orange"
                } else if (value > 25) {
                  "yellow"
                } else if (value < 25) {
                  "green"
                }
                list(fontWeight = 600, background = color, align = "center", color = "white")
              }
            )
          )
)

```
